title: Tuff Golem

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Become stone. __Anything__ negative will not be able to effect you for this night and tomorrow morning. This includes death, roleblocks, etcetera. However, you cannot speak or vote tomorrow morning, though reacting with Discord's reaction feature is fair game. You'll know who visits you.
- Come alive and scare a player who visited you. You can **only** use this on people who visited you while you were stone. They'll be scared and give you any items they have. They'll also be roleblocked.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will learn if you scare a player but they aren't roleblocked because of roleblock immunity or something similar.
- If you're attacked, you will **immediately** come alive and scare the player but the roleblock doesn't matter.

desc:
Post 2271
*A passive creature. Has a knack for surprising people by pretending to be a statue and suddenly coming to life.*
